data.desc: Change or read the data of any given object.

effect.desc: Give an effect to any given entity.

execute.desc: Specifies the conditions and positioning of a command.

fill.desc: Fill up a specified area with any given block.
fill.structure: posX posY posZ posX posY posZ block state method

give.desc: Give an item with given properties to any player.

loot.desc: Get the loot of any given object and insert it into another object.

particle.desc: Create a given amount of a type of particle in a given area.

playsound.desc: Play a sound to any player with given properties.

setblock.desc: Set a specified block space to any given block.
setblock.structure: posX posY posZ block state method

summon.desc: Summon an entity with a given position and properties.

tellraw.desc: Show a given string to an entity.
